|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S641632K-UC60; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1F:C6 |oui = 00:1F:C6

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 9 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The ASUS WL-320g is a simple wireless access point featuring one fast ethernet port and 54Mbps Broadcom wireless. The [[ASUS WL-320gP|WL-320gP]] variant is PoE capable. The [[ASUS WL-320gE|WL-320gE]] does not.
===Specifications=== *Interface: :LAN: 1x FE (RJ45) for 10/100 BaseT :with auto cross-over function (MDI/MDI-X) :support IEEE 802.3af Power over Ethernet (PoE) *Antenna: :2x external dipole (5dBi) antenna :with Reverse-SMA antenna connector :supports antenna diversity *Output Power: :20dBm (FCC regulation) or 15dBm (CE regulation) :in b/g mode with 1.5dB tolerance *Power: :AC Input: 100~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output: 5V with max. 2A current
Default settings (including the SSID) are per ''ASUS'''s manual.
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl320g Asus WL-320gP on '''OpenWRT''' wiki] *{{WPLink|Asus_routers}}
===Reviews=== *[http://compress.ru/article.aspx?id=17670 On '''ComPress''']
